short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The unique solution to clear your Facebook feed from every Ads and sponsored content !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Social AdBlock is an unique and the best solution on the market to free your Facebook Feed from every type of paid content (Sponsored, Ads). Social AdBlock is a totally free and fast software to protect you against Ads ! We don't collect data, we just want to protect you. 

Feel free to contact us for any user experience !

Social AdBlock is available on different language as English, French, Spanish, Italian, Romanian, Slovenian, Turkish, Portugese and many other.
